name: Galactic Civilizations II: Ultimate Edition
description: Installer for Galactic Civilizations II: Ultimate Edition download from Stardock.
notes:
To play different versions, change the exe as follows:

Twlight of the Arnor (default) - exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Stardock Games/GalCiv2/Twilight/GC2TwilightOfTheArnor.exe

Dreadlords - exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Stardock Games/GalCiv2/GalCiv2.exe

Dart Avatar - exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Stardock Games/GalCiv2/DarkAvatar/GC2DarkAvatar.exe
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the game's installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Stardock Games/GalCiv2/Twilight/GC2TwilightOfTheArnor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
